thread.title: Still intrest for some new maps? :)

post.author: ZizZ^
post.body:
Hey guys whats up?

I dont know if any of you remember me but i used to make several maps for doom3. The last one being one for a fun Doom3 map contest over here severaaaal months ago hosted by The Happy friar!

I just felt the urge to make another map for doom3!!! I have such great memories with this game and the whole modding community behind it...even mapping for a canceled and very ambitious mod "recall to hell" RIP. I got a feeling of nostalgia

Are there still people around looking for new maps to play?

post.author: tea monster
post.body:
Oh YES!

I'm late to the party so I've been playing through most of the mods that exist. I'm just getting through Eldoom at the moment. So yes please, I'd love some maps.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
You should make a new map, yes. Your maps are flat out awesome.

Hey, you could always release your RTH maps too.

post.author: bkt
post.body: Zizz, personally I'm keen for any new doom maps/mods, but a new map from you? Hell yes! Make sure you use sikkmod, because I'm sure you could come up with some rather creative ways to use the tech Or not... just make another map and we'll all be stoked! Considering how great your speedmap was, it'd be awesome to see what you could do with more than a week.

post.author: ZizZ^
post.body:
Well thanks for those comments and i'm happy to see some interst.

I Actually started to work on something already. More on that in the "map wip" section soon!

Cheers

post.author: SurlyBird
post.body: New maps would be greatly appreciated! I'm trying to do the same!

post.author: Argoon1981
post.body: Go for it!!

post.author: Gzegzolka
post.body: if they are for single player - yes

post.author: Douglas Quaid
post.body:
Quote:
Still intrest for some new maps?

No! No maps!

post.author: Gzegzolka
post.body:
Douglas Quaid wrote:
Quote:
Still intrest for some new maps?

No! No maps!


You are infidel!
